course_description: A fast-paced 10-day intensive course focused on JavaScript-specific coding challenges and interview questions. Perfect for developers preparing for frontend/fullstack interviews at top tech companies.

day_1.title: JavaScript Fundamentals Review
day_1.description: Brush up on core JS concepts with practical problems

day_2.title: String Manipulation Mastery
day_2.description: Master string processing with JavaScript's powerful methods

day_3.title: Hash Maps & Sets
day_3.description: Leverage JavaScript's Map and Set for optimal solutions

day_4.title: Mathematical Operations
day_4.description: Handle edge cases in mathematical computations

day_5.title: Midpoint Challenge
day_5.description: Mixed problems to test your progress so far

day_6.title: Async JavaScript Challenges
day_6.description: Coming soon - Promises, async/await, and concurrency

day_7.title: Functional Programming Patterns
day_7.description: Coming soon - Higher-order functions and immutability

day_9.title: Performance Optimization
day_9.description: Coming soon - Memory management and performance tuning

day_10.title: Mock Interview Simulation
day_10.description: Final assessment with realistic interview scenarios
